law.catch_line: With respect to a transaction subject to this subtitle, a person must comply with all requirements o...
law.text:
With respect to a transaction subject to this subtitle, a person must comply with all requirements of this subtitle before the person:
makes a tender offer for, invites tenders of, enters into an agreement to exchange securities for, or otherwise acquires any voting security or security convertible into voting security of a domestic insurer or of an insurance holding company controlling a domestic insurer; or
makes an agreement to merge with or otherwise to acquire control of a domestic insurer or of an insurance holding company controlling a domestic insurer.
